definition: surname Su/abbr. for Soviet Union 蘇維埃|苏维埃 or 蘇聯|苏联/abbr. for Jiangsu province 江蘇|江苏/abbr. for Suzhou city 蘇州|苏州
Perilla frutescens (Chinese basil or wild red basil)/place name/to revive/used as phonetic in transliteration
square/frame/rule/(legal) case/style/character/standard/pattern/(grammar) case/(classical) to obstruct/to hinder/(classical) to arrive/to come/(classical) to investigate/to study exhaustively
surname Lan/abbr. for Lanzhou 蘭州|兰州[Lan2 zhou1], Gansu
orchid (蘭花|兰花 Cymbidium goeringii)/fragrant thoroughwort (蘭草|兰草 Eupatorium fortunei)/lily magnolia (木蘭|木兰)

pinyin: Su1 ge2 lan2 Nu:3 wang2 Ma3 li4
Su1 ge2 lan2 Zhe2 er3 mao1
Su1 ge2 lan2 mu4 yang2 quan3

sentences.english: A city of southwest Scotland on the Clyde River.
sentences.chinese: 苏格兰西南部克莱德河上的一个城市。

sentences.english: In Scotland students take the SCE examinations.
sentences.chinese: 在苏格兰，学生们参加SCE考试。

sentences.english: I'm just really sad I couldn't give my speech in Gaelic.
sentences.chinese: 我只是感到伤心不能用苏格兰语发表感言。

sentences.english: But where were the Scots from?
sentences.chinese: 但是，苏格兰人又是从哪里来的？

sentences.english: He ordered a large double scotch from the bar man.
sentences.chinese: 他向酒吧服务员要了大杯双人份苏格兰威士卡。

sentences.english: He claimed to be s Scot but had a powerful Liverpool accent.
sentences.chinese: 他说自己是苏格兰人，却有着浓重的利物普口音。

sentences.english: Drambuie ---- a strong sweet alcoholic drink from Scotland made with whisky and herbs.
sentences.chinese: 杜林标酒，苏格兰威士忌，蜂蜜香酒。

sentences.english: In Scotts law pupil children have tutors.
sentences.chinese: 在苏格兰法律中，学令儿童有监护人。

sentences.english: McCain's family tree includes Scots-Irish and English ancestors.
sentences.chinese: 麦凯恩的族谱，包括苏格兰，爱尔兰和英国的祖先。

sentences.english: Er, do you do trips to Scotland?
sentences.chinese: 嗯，你们有去苏格兰的旅游吗？

sentences.english: Maybe go camping in Scotland, what do you think?
sentences.chinese: 可能去苏格兰露营，你觉得怎么样？

sentences.english: What would you like to drink?A Scotch, a screw-driver or a martini?
sentences.chinese: 苏格兰威士忌酒，还是起子酒或马丁尼酒？

sentences.english: In general , Scotland is colder throughout the year .
sentences.chinese: 总的来说，苏格兰全年较冷。

sentences.english: She wrote that she was learning Scottish dances and having a wonderful time.
sentences.chinese: 她说她正在学跳苏格兰舞玩得很高兴。

sentences.english: Churchill's basically a crazier, Scottish version of Kilgore.
sentences.chinese: 基本上邱杰就是个更疯狂的苏格兰版祈戈。

sentences.english: Fierce and wild warriors from the Scottish Highlands.
sentences.chinese: 高地斧兵是来自苏格兰高地剽悍骁勇的战士。

definition: United Kingdom 聯合王國|联合王国[Lian2 he2 wang2 guo2]/United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland/abbr. for England 英格蘭|英格兰[Ying1 ge2 lan2]
